In England, in the seven days to 01 April, there were 403,324 new confirmed cases (713.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 March, there were 499,641 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 19% (96,317 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 April is 18,070,000 (31,953.9 cases per 100,000 population).
